FuncDef:
The lpu backpressure reset enable command enables the function to restart a faulty board.
The undo lpu backpressure reset enable command disables this function.
By default, the function to restart a faulty board is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A faulty board may reset when encountering level-3 backpressure. To restart the faulty board, run the lpu backpressure reset enable command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
